description.value:
Requirements You have at least one hand free. The target can't be more than one size larger than you

You push a creature away from you. Attempt an Athletics check against your target's Fortitude DC.

Critical Success You push your target up to 10 feet away from you. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Stride]{Stride} after it, but you must move the same distance and in the same direction.

Success You push your target back 5 feet. You can Stride after it, but you must move the same distance and in the same direction.

Critical Failure You lose your balance, fall, and land @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}.
